title: Opinion: Opinion | Bangladesh Polls: How Yunus' Fate Will Also Decide The Country's Fate
summary_full: Yunus sees himself as the prime candidate for the post of President. Yet, on the streets of Bangladesh, he is unpopular and much reviled.
summary_public: Yunus sees himself as the prime candidate for the post of President. Yet, on the streets of Bangladesh, he is unpopular and much reviled.
